entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Mine Centre

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
